Hellplague:
 
"I don't know.  I have always doubted Necross' logic, but Splattercannon will probably settle for leveling this ship.  We'll just have to wait and find out," she said with a pained smirk.

rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:
OOC: No problem, I just thought it would better I said somthing so I
could figure out what was going on.  Post when you can.  ^_^

Celeron unconciously begins to charge up his arm cannons as well, he
allways did that when he was nervous.  He hoped that he would be able
to effectively repel this attack.

"Do you think they'll try that hatch, or somewhere easier?"


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!"
